name: Ninja I & II
overview:
It's a brand new 2-in-1 game for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES)! Ninja and Ninja II are a series of multiple events/mini-games. They are fast-paced QTE (Quick Time Events) based mini-games that challenge players of all ages at reactions speeds, button mashing, and precise on-screen timing; hailing from Toshi503 Studios for the Nintendo Entertainment System (NES).

These mini-games are geared around the utilization of different control schemes per stage/event. While most games tend to use the same control scheme throughout their game, the Ninja games try something different; while the aim remains at keeping the controls intuitive per stage. Each stage has its own unique soundtrack that I composed, so that everyone can enjoy something different as the game progresses.
